dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data and break down problems into manageable parts to find a solution.
Your FarTwin will rely on instincts and experience to guide their approach and find creative solutions.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in groups?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be the center of attention and engage fully with others, encouraging social interaction.
Your FarTwin will listen attentively to others and observe social dynamics before contributing or taking action.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach uncertain or high-risk situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach risks with caution, weighing options carefully before making a decision.
Your FarTwin will seek out exciting and challenging experiences, embracing uncertainty as a catalyst for growth.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prefer to learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on abstract concepts and theories, seeking to understand the underlying principles.
Your FarTwin will learn through hands-on experience and application, preferring tangible results over theoretical frameworks.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks and manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach tasks in a structured, step-by-step manner, ensuring efficiency and productivity.
Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances and priorities, embracing flexibility in their schedule.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express emotions to others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely share their feelings and thoughts, prioritizing authenticity over tact or reserve.
Your FarTwin will carefully consider when to express emotions, often choosing restraint over openness.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will explore established creative outlets, such as music or art, to express themselves.
Your FarTwin will push boundaries and experiment with novel forms of creative expression, seeking unique solutions.
